alert.note: Alert for Northern Spartanburg; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 01 at 7:10AM EST until January 01 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Southern Greenville, Northern Spartanburg and Southern Spartanburg Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dense fog may expand to more of the area overnight and more zones may need to be added to the Advisory as this happens. Keep up with the latest forecast.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Northern Spartanburg; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg
